title: HP X4000b Bluetooth Mouse (H3T51AA#ABC)
description: Is it possible? Can a stationary mouse actually look like it's moving? It can now. The purposeful, high-end design of the HP Bluetooth Mouse X4000b mimics the motion of a fast sports car. But the fun doesn't stop with its cool, comfortable shape. This modern mouse also saves valuable USB port space with Bluetooth wireless connectivity. The impressive 9-month battery life(1) surpasses the competition. Plus, a highly-precise laser sensor works on almost every surface. (1)Actual battery life will vary with use and environmental conditions. The maximum capacity of the battery will naturally decrease with time and usage. (2)Laser sensor is not guaranteed to work on glass surfaces. (3)Compared to website information of these models as of 2/8/12: Microsoft Bluetooth Notebook Laser Mouse 5000, Logitech V470
